[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@yext/answers-react-components](./answers-react-components.md) &gt; [ComponentsContentPath](./answers-react-components.componentscontentpath.md)

## ComponentsContentPath variable

Content path to the source files in component library that utilizes Tailwind class names. This is intended to be used in user's custom tailwind config.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ComponentsContentPath = "node_modules/@yext/answers-react-components/lib/**/*.{js,jsx}"
```

## Remarks

This assumes that the node\_modules folder containing the component library is in adjacent level with the user's tailwind.config.js file.

## Example

In user's tailwind.config.js file:

```js
const { ComponentsContentPath } = require('@yext/answers-react-components')
module.exports = {
 content: [ ComponentsContentPath ],
 ...
};
```
